local_intent: Securely grasp the fridge handle by closing the gripper after aligning at 90° yaw.
assumptions: 90° wrist yaw is appropriate for side grasp
coherence_with_global: Matches global flow around the grasp: DetectObject → OpenGripper → Retry(ApproachAndAlign) → SetTCPYaw(90) → AtOrientation(90) → CloseGripper(20,800) → verify with ObjectInGripper.
